sense.gloss: something unusual, something wrong, mishap, accident, serious condition (e.g. after an injury), different situation

sdata.j: トムね、↑入院↑↓にゅういん↓することになったらしいけど↑命↑↓いのち↓には↑別状↑↓|べつじょう|↓ないって。
sdata.e: I've heard that Tom has been admitted to hospital, but there shouldn't be any risk to his life.
